                           NOTE:
Hillsong United has teamed up with the highly anticipated upcoming movie release Son of God featuring a remix of "Oceans" exclusive for the soundtrack. Just like the uniqueness of Hillsong United's music, the Soundtrack for this major motion picture has the unique and motivational inclusion of featuring the actual words of Jesus spoken throughout the Soundtrack.
